name: Hardenville
description:
Step into the shoes of a 21-year-old male protagonist on a journey from zero to hero in the captivating world of Hardenville. In this adult Visual Novel, your choices shape your destiny as you navigate friendships, romance, drama, and personal growth. Immerse yourself in stunning illustrations and captivating storylines with characters that come to life. Are you ready to explore mature themes and face the consequences of your decisions?

In this first release, you can enjoy approximately 45 minutes of linear gameplay. But that's just the beginning! We have some exciting news - Episode 1 is set to launch late December or early January, and it will contain more than twice the content of the Prologue.

What is Hardenville?

Hardenville is an adult Visual Novel planned for release on Mac and Windows. This enthralling game features:

  • Beautiful Illustrations: Engage with stunning visuals rendered in 4k.
  • Captivating Storylines: Delve into a world filled with drama, romance, and deep emotions.
  • Relationship Themes: Straight, Lesbian.
  • Mature Themes: Explore mature themes like sex and nudity (All characters depicted are 18+ years old).
  • Early Access Content: Starting with The Prologue, the upcoming Episodes 1 to 9 will aim to offer 1000 images and 25 animations each, much more content than The Prologue.

Hardenville won't include

  • NTR

What's Under the Hood?

Hardenville is crafted with Daz Studio and Ren'Py, showcasing the best in visual and interactive design. Static images are rendered in 4k, while animations are rendered in 1080p, then upscaled to 4k for an immersive experience.

Join Our Community

Become part of the journey by joining our community on Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/XPmezdYHeX

Explore mature themes and make decisions that resonate with your journey. Hardenville awaits you, where choices shape destiny.
